verses.verse: And if his <S%H7133>oblation<s%> be a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H8002>peace-offerings<s%>; if he <S%H7126>offer<s%> of the <S%H1241>herd<s%>, whether <S%H2145>male<s%> or <S%H5347>female<s%>, he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> it without <S%H8549>blemish<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And he shall <S%H5564>lay<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> upon the <S%H7218>head<s%> of his <S%H7133>oblation<s%>, and <S%H7819>kill<s%> it at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>: and <S%H175>Aaron<s%>'s <S%H1121>sons<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> shall <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>.

And he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> of the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H8002>peace-offerings<s%> an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that <S%H3680>covereth<s%> the <S%H7130>inwards<s%>, and all the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that is upon the <S%H7130>inwards<s%>,

and the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3629>kidneys<s%>, and the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that is on <S%H3689>them<s%>, which is by the loins, and the <S%H3508>caul<s%> upon the <S%H3516>liver<s%>, with the <S%H3629>kidneys<s%>, shall he take <S%H5493>away<s%>.

And <S%H175>Aaron<s%>'s <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> it on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> upon the <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>, which is upon the <S%H6086>wood<s%> that is on the <S%H784>fire<s%>: it is an offering made by <S%H784>fire<s%>, of a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savor<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And if his <S%H7133>oblation<s%> for a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H8002>peace-offerings<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> be of the <S%H6629>flock<s%>; <S%H2145>male<s%> or <S%H5347>female<s%>, he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> it without <S%H8549>blemish<s%>.
If he <S%H7126>offer<s%> a <S%H3775>lamb<s%> for his <S%H7133>oblation<s%>, then shall he <S%H7126>offer<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>;

and he shall <S%H5564>lay<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> upon the <S%H7218>head<s%> of his <S%H7133>oblation<s%>, and <S%H7819>kill<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>: and <S%H175>Aaron<s%>'s <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> thereof upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>.

And he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> of the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H8002>peace-offerings<s%> an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; the fat <S%H2459>thereof<s%>, the fat <S%H451>tail<s%> <S%H8549>entire<s%>, he shall take <S%H5493>away<s%> <S%H5980>hard<s%> by the <S%H6096>backbone<s%>; and the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that <S%H3680>covereth<s%> the <S%H7130>inwards<s%>, and all the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that is upon the <S%H7130>inwards<s%>,

and the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3629>kidneys<s%>, and the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that is upon <S%H3689>them<s%>, which is by the loins, and the <S%H3508>caul<s%> upon the <S%H3516>liver<s%>, with the <S%H3629>kidneys<s%>, shall he take <S%H5493>away<s%>.
And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> it upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%>: it is the <S%H3899>food<s%> of the offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
And if his <S%H7133>oblation<s%> be a <S%H5795>goat<s%>, then he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>:

and he shall <S%H5564>lay<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> upon the <S%H7218>head<s%> of <S%H7819>it<s%>, and kill it <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>; and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> thereof upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>.

And he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> thereof his <S%H7133>oblation<s%>, even an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that <S%H3680>covereth<s%> the <S%H7130>inwards<s%>, and all the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that is upon the <S%H7130>inwards<s%>,

and the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3629>kidneys<s%>, and the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that is upon <S%H3689>them<s%>, which is by the loins, and the <S%H3508>caul<s%> upon the <S%H3516>liver<s%>, with the <S%H3629>kidneys<s%>, shall he take <S%H5493>away<s%>.

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> them upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%>: it is the <S%H3899>food<s%> of the offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%>, for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savor<s%>; all the <S%H2459>fat<s%> is <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>'s.

It shall be a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H2708>statute<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations<s%> in all your <S%H4186>dwellings<s%>, that ye shall <S%H398>eat<s%> neither <S%H2459>fat<s%> nor <S%H1818>blood<s%>.
